title: Great if pet hair is your problem!
text: I am personally not a fan of the crossover waistband, I find with my body type they roll consistently. These leggings are buttery soft however and they fit a little on the larger side.They do work quite well at wicking away animal hair. I have 2 cats, one long haired and one short, and also a Boxer and an olde English Bulldog. Seemed to fight well against all these different types of pet hair!

title: Nice products when they actually…
text: Nice products when they actually arrive. But the shipping process and delivery times are ridiculously slow. Order placed on 16/10 and still hasn’t been shipped. It’s now 6/11! Seems a little bit too slow in comparison to other online retailers! Disappointed once again as last order was even longer and thought it was lost but took so long!!! Hopefully worth the wait!!

title: I was so excited to buy the leggings BUT...
text: I was so excited to buy the leggings. I got the wrong size the first time but no returns so I ordered a bigger pair. All the videos and advertisements about the tummy control leggings state that they don't fall down but they do. I also bought the booty lifting ones and they are ok but created a roll under my butt that is not flattering. I am disappointed but now stuck with these because all sales are final so it is what it is and lesson learned.

title: Smell is unbearable but the pants themselves are amazing.
text: The shipping time is a little bit to long, the smell that come with the clothing is unbearable and I have yet to be able to remove it, through 4 washes, 2 days hanging out side and one vinegar soak they still real and I am unable to wear them. If I can ever get rid of the smell they will be my favorite pants and worth 10/5 stars, but if not they are a 0 since they can’t even be worn.

title: The product was unexpectedly bad
text: The product was unexpectedly bad. With so many influencers pushing this product on social media I was expecting a quality product. The Breezeful Jumper was so cheap looking for $50 spent. The color and fabric of the top didn’t match the bottom. The fabric for the attached pant/bottom resembled and felt like a microfiber bedsheet fabric. Return policy not easy or convenient. I opted for the gift card/credit which leaves me with a jumpsuit I’ll never ever wear and a gift card to buy more product from your website. I’m not confident that I’ll be happy with another purchase. We will see.

title: I absolutely loved the pants but truly needed a different size
text: I absolutely loved the pants but truly needed a different size.  Couldn’t return them because that doesn’t qualify as a reason for return.  This was my first order.   Trying to decide whether to order again

title: Super long shipping time
text: Super long shipping time, I don’t mind paying for shipping, I just wish I also had a choice to pick a faster shipping option even if I have to pay more, which I don’t mind since I have to pay anyway…Clothing fits okay but I don’t likeSome of the stitching across the thigh, it makes unnecessary rolls…

title: Return process needs serious reconsideration!!
text: Some of the pants do not have a petite, regular and tall option so if the length doesn’t work, they either require tailoring or a return. I wanted to return them as I didn’t care for the amount of flare on the bottom because it made the length disparity even more pronounced. I then discovered  customer service was non-existent and the return process is laborious and confusing. I was even more disappointed to learn that I have to pay for the return shipping. Needless to say, after ordering a handful of times and now feeling like I’m stuck with pants I’m not happy with, I’m not sure I will order again.

title: Did not fit,no exchange option and…
text: Did not fit,no exchange option and charge for returns. Using the sizing charts and reviews, I chose a M Regular and am literally swimming in the pants. They are a nice material and seem well constructed but simply do not fit. Return options are inconvenient.

title: Black pants don’t stretch
text: I had no issues whatsoever with shopping . The only issue I have is that the black pants I bought don’t stretch nearly as much as every other pair I have in different colors. They’re actually too tight to wear. Pity, I live all the colors I have and had hoped to have a black pair to wear as well.

title: Bought the sochinched
text: Bought the sochinched. Not the best material. Not very stretchy. Waistband rolls. Not what I expected. The video made it look like the same material as the softlyzero but def less stretchy

title: The item I received was great but the…
text: The item I received was great but the experience and delayed shipping wasn't great.  The communication about the delays were timely but didn't give a timeline or any information other than it has been delayed.

title: I couldn't believe how long it took for…
text: I couldn't believe how long it took for my order to be shipped.  At least a week after I placed the order it finally left the warehouse. The pants are okay, nothing spectacular.

title: While they are quite comfortable it’s…
text: While they are quite comfortable it’s much more spandex like than I would have liked and I find the 7/8 for better than the full length but I have major pulling on one pair after just a couple hours of wear.

title: 2 medium petite high waisted pants of same style but different fitting/ length
text: I ordered  the same style and of same petite medium size of high waisted pants but received different fittings/length. One is just right but the other is 1inch shorter and more tight around the waist. I can’t return it because I just realized that it was a final sale and can’t be return.I’ll remember next time not to buy a final sale item.The other one was just perfect, soft, good quality , comfy and fits well .I could have given it a 5 star if the other one is of the same size/ fitting.

title: It was fine but unneccessarily…
text: It was fine but unneccessarily cumbersome. I had to write an email, wait for a reply, fill out a form (which included mandatory photos), and wait for a reply, then I got my return options to which I had to submit a response and wait yet again for (finally) a return label and packing slip. Took several days keeping an eye on my email. It felt like I was discouraged from making the return.

title: Mildew smell on arrival
text: Love your products- however - Two of my three items arrived smelling strongly of mildew. When I contacted you, you did not make it easy. Complicated return instructions rather than apologizing and sending fresh ones. Not good…

title: Pretty typical fast fashion retailer
text: Pretty typical fast fashion retailer. Quality is very hit-or-miss and the return process isn't as straightforward as they make it seem (first you have to submit a request to even get permission to make a return, then you get specific instructions that vary depending on...some criteria they don't make public).

title: Extremely slow shipping
text: The pants are great! I really love the stretch and comfort but the shipping is entirely too slow. I really want another pair but it takes too long to receive them. I’ll pass because shipping is horrible.

title: Shipping & return policies aren’t great…
text: Shipping & return policies aren’t great for a large company. New customers should get free returns for first order when finding what size fits. Plus it wasnt easy to tell when it would arrive (I dont want any more apps) & took a long time to ship.

title: Some of the things I've ordered seem…
text: Some of the things I've ordered seem very high quality, however some other things I've ordered are made of cheap feeling material. If you want to return something you have to send pictures get your return accepted, and then pay to send it back, and then they will refund you.

title: Shopping from the app was easy
text: Shopping from the app was easy. However I am disappointed with one of the trousers as the quality is not as good. Seems are not properly done and the fabric is much thinner than it looks on the pictures.

title: I am disappointed with the colour…
text: I am disappointed with the colour— the image looked like a darker blue and it was more bright than expected.The fit however is awesome and so comfortable. I would love to own more but nervous about ordering due to the colour not being what it looked like in the picture.I was also a bit disappointed to find that the day after I ordered them there was a 50% sale and it appears from Instagram that it is still going on. I found that disappointing.Otherwise happy with the comfort and fit and the option to not have a zipper and button jabbing into my stomach!

title: Great material not sure how to exchange
text: The pants seem to fit, but they were big on my waist. I'd like to exchange but when I looked online I couldnt find information on how to exchange. I was given a coupon from the company, put 3 $50 jeans in my cart, and was told my coupon was not valid. No deal, ok, I purchased anyways. Material is great! Style or size isn't right for my pear shaped figure.

title: ordered 2 pair of pants in exact size…
text: ordered 2 pair of pants in exact size exact style - one pair fits and one is too small.  I requested a refund 3 days ago and am still waiting on a response.

title: Didn't care for the High Waisted Button…
text: Didn't care for the High Waisted Button Multiple Pockets Straight Leg Casual Pants. The fit is off. Don't like the lining on the inside. I am 45, 3 kids, 5'6 typically size 8/10 athletic build. However I do like the fit of Halara Flex High Waisted Multiple Pockets Wide Leg Washed Stretchy Knit. But the exchange for a second pair will be a pain.

title: Love the pants as they are super…
text: Love the pants as they are super comfortable and true to size but their tracking information was not very helpful.  I need to reach out to their customer service to confirm if they even received my order.

title: The pants are great. —
text: I really like the pants I ordered.  I think you should inform your customers if there will be a delay in shipping.  That is my only complaint.  I will order again and hopefully I will receive my order faster than my first order.

title: VERY TIGHT
text: I ordered my true size. They definitely smooth everything, but they are so tight I had to take them off after about 30 minutes because they were so uncomfortable. They also roll down at the top

title: Returns could be more transparent
text: I wish the return process was more clear and they let you know ahead of time where you need to ship things so you can calculate the cost of shipping. They did give me a gift card and let me keep the items, so I can't complain too much, but when you purchase something thinking you'll be able to return it and then the return process is way more complicated than you thought, it's just a little bit frustrating.

title: Two pants weren’t so cute as pictured
text: Two pants weren’t so cute as pictured, I love this brand and was a little disappointed with this order

title: High waisted Flare Jeans Halara advertising is very good as it…
text: Halara advertising is very good as it lures you into buying.The high waisted flare trousers look very nice but the fail to mention it’s not   Stretchy jeans  fabric but a look alike stretchy jeans  fabric which is a cheaper quality and is been sold at expensive price.The stitching and fit is excellent.

title: Only complaint was shipping
text: Only complaint was shipping. My package took more than 10 days to arrive once in the US. This was much longer than last time. Not sure what happened but I started to think it would never arrive!

title: Comfortable but not as expected.
text: These pants are well made and comfortable. The pockets are too small and too shallow, and since there are no back pockets I cannot put my phone in a pocket which is inconvenient. My tube of lip balm also falls out of my pocket all the time, which is really annoying. I was surprised that the fabric is 100% legging fabric, and there is an obnoxious reflective logo on the left leg which really screams “leggings” as opposed to “pants”. Did that logo really have to go there??? On the whole they are just OK. Not great.

title: I love the quality and fit
text: I love the quality and fit, actually a little too big, but that's okay, I'll order a size down next time. I just wish the shipping time wasn't so long.

title: These run a bit large…
text: These run a bit large compared to other leggings. Hopefully a couple rounds of washing and drying will shrink them a bit, but the fit is not flattering when they're too big.

title: My emails were not read properly which…
text: My emails were not read properly which caused some back and forth before I was able to return my order.  I was way more complicated than it should have been.  The people were nice, though.

title: I ordered 3 pairs of pants in a…
text: I ordered 3 pairs of pants in a straight leg style and all three came with wide legs. The return system is impossible to navigate. Customer service is slow.

title: Way too many adverts and pop ups
text: Way too many adverts and pop ups. Returns complicated. Quality of clothing is good for price but getting there is just a faff

title: Stain
text: One of my pants in the order came with a stain or problem with the stitching. The pants are black so it’s extremely visible. Wanted to love the pants otherwise!

title: Different fit from ones previously ordered
text: I ordered the high waisted button zipper multiple pockets solid skinny hiking cargo pants in forest nighy because I previously ordered them in black. Same size, completely different fit. The fabric for the forest night is not stretchy and I can’t get them buttoned. Black ones are perfect.

title: I love Halara products, but…
text: I love Halara products. They’re comfortable, easy to move in, fit my active lifestyle and they arrive in good time. However, I was disappointed that I cannot delete or edit reviews, nor can staff delete or edit them for me. I find the lack of flexibility mind boggling in this day an age.

title: Nice product, will order again
text: I like the product but do not realize it wasn't made in Canada although it ships from Eastern Canada.  I do like that mass quantities are NOT produced.

title: I’m trying to return some items because…
text: I’m trying to return some items because they don’t fit and they show that I don’t have an account even though I do with my email.

title: No easy exchanges.
text: Site experience was fine, but leggings were very ill fitting and I could not easily exchange. Very baggy.

title: I love the pants but… quality
text: I love the pants and how comfortable they are. Unfortunately, they smell awful. I washed them twice now and they just smell like an awful stink probably from cheap material or color die used. They didn’t send updated shipping notification. They just showed up in my mailbox and the next day I got a email saying order was on the way.

title: Ordered my size, but way to tight
text: Ordered my size, but they are extremely tight. I understand they are supposed to be, but breathing is important too. :)

title: I wish I could have tracked my package
text: I wish I could have tracked my package! I am not going to download an app in order to track a package.You should have a link to yrack packages when you say it is shipped snd on its way!

title: Love style/ fit- smell not so much
text: Love, love, love the pants!  They are exactly as advertised. However they have a horrible chimical smell.  After 2 washes with Oxiclean and baking soada it almost gone and I can wear the pants.

title: Cute style poor fit
text: I liked the style of both the pants and the skirt, unfortunately they did not flatter my body shape. I felt they both emphasized my lower belly.

title: I love the pants however they were way…
text: I love the pants however they were way too long and because the way I bought them I couldn’t return them. Apparently I need a petite in lake not a regular.

title: I like the material of the leggings but…
text: I like the material of the leggings but I do find that I have to keep pulling them up, which is a bit annoying

title: The pants are super comfortable &…
text: The pants are super comfortable & fashionable. I was extremely excited that they offered it “petite” sizes but they’re really long & still needed to get them hemmed. I’m 5’2” for reference

title: The outfit was too short
text: The outfit was too short, hit pretty high above the ankles. I had ordered them in tall. The pockets were too high. I was disappointed, because they are cute in the ads.

title: The reason for only 3 stars is the…
text: The reason for only 3 stars is the simple fact that they need more Petite sizes for the shorter ladies out here!

title: I guess as a heavier woman I ordered…
text: I guess as a heavier woman I ordered the size that I thought would slide right on me like this skinny woman in the ad. But that’s not the truth. When I put the pants on, they actually look like tight leggings or tight yoga pants.

title: The pencil skirt in medium was absolutely perfect and so soft. The jeans also super soft but too big in the same size!
text: Love the skirt in medium for perfect. Pants in same size medium too big now I have to return for a smaller size cause I dont have the feee shipping with two items

title: Mixed experience
text: The shopping experience was easy.  But the wide leg stretch jeans are much wider than the looked on the models.  I already cut tag off or would return. Very comfortable though so will wear just around the house.

title: Size tall is for normal height people
text: It's a shame their tall sizes are actually better for normal height women. I'm 6ft, and a size tall in most other shops where it fits fine, but a size tall is so short at Halara. Gutted as their trousers look so nice ☹️

title: I had to repeatedly ask for the address…
text: I had to repeatedly ask for the address to mail return items and when I tried to call the customer number or use the customer support email they were unavailable. having never bought anything from you before it makes you question the quality of your company or whether you exist

title: Metal buttons should be sewn on…
text: Metal buttons should be sewn on garment. Every time I wash them, there is a metal button in washing machine that has come off the pants.

title: I'm on the fence
text: At first I was very frustrated because the order had not arrived after 25 days and when I contacted customer service I got a very mechanical response with an explanation that didn't match the dates at all. I replied and got a second response much of the same. I replied one more time giving you a chance and you came through. I received a response that made it obvious someone actually looked at my order and actually gave me authentic information. I was frustrated enough to consider never doing business with your company again but I have to admit that I do like the pants.

title: cute items
text: The product in theory was cute I just didn’t like how it fit me. Super disappointed to find out you have to pay to return your items.

title: Shipping was very slow
text: Shipping was very slow. Waited nearly a month after purchase and it took close to two weeks to arrive. Not sure if I'd order again. Item is ok, not worth the $ amount for the quality.

title: The item said straight leg and it's…
text: The item said straight leg and it's more of bellbottom pants. I was a little disappointed in that being misled.

title: Small fitting
text: The item received was beautiful and very good quality. Fitting is really small and didn’t fit and I got my size. Leggings but with very little stretch to them. Took almost 2 weeks to arrive and unsure how to return so just kept them. Expensive for leggings at £35 with delivery

title: Mixed reviews
text: I like the wide leg pants, very comfortable. However the micro-waffle wide leg do wrinkle slightly; they claim that they don't. Also, their return policy is somewhat inconvenient.

title: The size on the jacket is way off, slow shipping
text: The size on the jacket is way off, a Large is equivalent to a 6-8.  Shipping took forever,  I earned 2 prizes, they were both card holders, not something I would use or wanted.

title: Clothes low quality but good costumer support
text: I thought it was a German brand, but everything is actually made in China. The quality of the clothes is rather poor, but some are okay. Sizes are a bit random (for the tops, at least).The good point is that they refund you all the clothes you don't like, without you having to ship them back (yes you can keep them even if they reimbursed you, which is saying something about the cost of production...)

title: Excellent clothes but long delivery…
text: Excellent clothes but long delivery times and difficult to get in contact. Discounts disappear when you try to use them. If it says 2for1, it’s usually not true, and the prize you pay is more than 2 for 1.

title: One item came in the wrong size
text: One item came in the wrong size! They fit isn't snug. Not butt lifting. Material is nice. We'll see how they last and wash. I wish they'd sent all large, why one an XL? Damn!!

title: I love the products, but
text: I love the products, but this order took too long. Didn’t know it was coming from China. Very disappointed.

title: The pants did not fit the way I…
text: The pants did not fit the way I expected them too. They were a little uncomfortable and were not high waisted as I thought they would be.

title: Sizing off-returns hard
text: Sizing off, trying to return for refund is very frustrating-I think halara does this on purpose so people just give up

title: Decent quality for cost
text: Received 2 pairs of trousers. Quality as expected however the hem was machine stitched and about 2 inches deep which changed the aesthetics of the trousers. Smaller, neater hem would be better.I ordered the Tall trousers....32*. I'm 5'8* and they are a little short. A longer version. Would be better please.I also would have liked a dark brown pair, but this wasn't an option in the colour choice.

title: Takes a while to receive clothing
text: Takes a while to receive clothing. Pricing is fair and not cheap. Only jeans with elastic tailie fit for me.

title: Material is heavier than I thought
text: The material is heavier than I thought.  Fit is very high waisted as I have a short torso it didn’t fit as expected. I would have gotten a smaller size but then the waist may have been too tight. Over all very comfy and stylish.

title: I love the product but…
text: I love the product - but one of the pairs of medium pants fit larger in me than the second one. I wanted to exchange the larger M for a S but your chat it said there were no exchanges. That sucks. I’m having them altered, but now I hesitate to buy from you again.

title: Returns process not easy
text: Returns process not easyI felt the returns process wasn’t easy . Trying to find the returns process on the website was difficult. I have sent a return request , which I thought was weird , awaiting a response. Did say it would take 24 hours for the returns request to be answered. Watch this space . It’s the first time I have used this company . The quality of some of the fabric isn’t great . The sizes are also not consistent.

title: Well it's really hard to get a…
text: Well it's really hard to get a reference number if you don't order on app, and hard to reach you guys on the app.  I had to look up halara canada to get my answers the app was hard to get my point across

title: Slow shipping, material picks
text: I like the fit and look of the clothes, but the material picks really easily and the shipping was very long.

title: Very nice pants.
text: Great pants, lots of color choices, well constructed. Very comfortable. The inseam for a petite was supposed to be 26 inches, it is actually 25 inches. Very disappointing.

title: Four pairs of amazing pants 😊 Great…
text: Four pairs of amazing pants 😊 Great material feel and fit !  One pair did not fit and the return process is not convenient!

title: I was very disappointed in the pants I…
text: I was very disappointed in the pants I purchased. They are just tights with pockets. The material is cheap, I will never buy them again !

title: Long Delivery Wait Times
text: I love the products, I will be purchasing again. But the delivery took 1+ months to arrive. That was a bit frustrating, but if you can improve then the service would be an overall 5 stars.

title: Very long shipping times
text: I like the clothing but shipping time was way too long. I inquired twice about where my order was because tracking information was not updated.

title: Return process could use some changes.
text: Product was just okay in my opinion. Items didn’t not fit. Shipping time was right at 2 weeks. I didn’t realize that they were being shipped from overseas, until after I’m placed the order. My fault for not doing more research. I had to return items. I had to email company to start the return process. I had to wait on the company to respond to the first email, after that I had to wait on the company to send me a second email. The whole return process is an inconvenience.  Seems like the process could be made a bit easier. I’m curious to see how long it will take to process my refund.

title: The jeans themselves are very nice but…
text: The jeans themselves are very nice but the waist band is way too tight. They fit great in the butt and hips but I just couldn’t breathe

title: Love the products but
text: Love the products. However, my refund credit expired before I could use it for my most recent purchase.

title: Okay
text: Good material and fit but does not have tummy control  feature. This was sent from China, but advertised as its from USA.

title: Product was great
text: Product was great. Delivery not so. No notification of when it would arrived then an email to say it had been delivered but not to where. Had to knock on doors till I found it. No customer care and no promised “free gift”

title: I didn’t like the shipping
text: I didn’t like the shipping. It was confusing and hard to follow the tracking

title: I am trying to return 2 pair of the…
text: I am trying to return 2 pair of the leggings that I don’t like and ever time I try to return them it say error on page. I need to return 2 pair of legging

title: The pants advertised as straight leg
text: The pants advertised as straight leg, but were flared. The pants are super soft and nice, I just didn't like the flared leg.

title: Buttons fall off and order took forever to come
text: The order took a long time to finally come. One pair of pants has a few buttons and 2 fell off back to back on me while I was at work. I had to run home to change. I’m not happy with how they were sewed on. One button the fell off is the one that holds my pants up. It discouraged me from wanting to buy from here again.

title: One pair of the 2 leggings I received…
text: One pair of the 2 leggings I received had an unsewn area in the inseam.

title: Super cute, but….
text: The pants are super cute and super comfortable.I can not get the strange smell out. It’s like a moth ball smell. Even after 3 washes.

title: Pants
text: I absolutely love the jeans however, the pants are more baggy than I like and unfortunately the sale is final so I can't exchange them

title: Shorter framed person...
text: Shorter framed person.... The style made my legs look frompy. But my tallest child cut off the buttons in the front and loves them as loungers around the house. Should have only bought 1 pair to try first...instead of exciting buying 3 pairs...live and learn.

title: Did not receive correct product and was denied request of getting sent the correct product
text: I ordered a pair of overalls TWICE and was disappointed both times. The first time o ordered a normal length one and it was too short. Then I ordered another pair in the tall length and it was still too short (it was the regular length). I tried working with service and asked if they would send me tall pair and they emailed back to ask for pictures of the length, which I did and then I received an email saying there is a variation of 1 to 3 inches on each pair of overalls which indicates inconsistency in the product. 1 to 3 inches can be a significant different in length hence my request for a tall pair and not receiving one that actually fit. After emailing back and forth with customer support and providing pictures as requested, they gave me the standard option of just returning the item or  receiving a store credit. If I would have known they weren’t going to solve my issue I would have just requested a return immediately instead of emailing back and forth with customer support for week. Based on the inconsistencies in their products and the lack of empathy in providing a feasible solution after not receiving the correct product, I would not recommend this company to anyone I know.

title: My size wasn't fit with your size of…
text: My size wasn't fit with your size of pants. Little bit thight. The pants smell a lot chimical stuff.

title: Quick delivery but found the sports/gym…
text: Quick delivery but found the sports/gym leggings to be very thin material, more like a tight.

title: Leggings are ok
text: Leggings are ok. Not exactly what I expected. You can see underwear through them so beware

title: Order a size down
text: I like them but the sizing runs big. I bought a lg and wish I would have bought a medium. I picked large because it was as for size 12-14. I wear a size 12. But they’re baggy and my butt looks as flat as a pancake.

title: I’ve ordered five pair of denim…
text: I’ve ordered five pair of denim leggings have only received two

title: Shipping
text: The clothing is perfect couldn’t complain if I wanted to. But the time frame it takes to receive the clothing from the time you place the order is a bit ridiculous.

title: I loved the style of the jumpsuit but…the material is wrinkled and very hard to get the wrinkles out.  I have to steam each time they are washed, very annoying.
text: I loved the style of the jumpsuit but the material is wrinkled and very hard to get the wrinkles out.  I have to steam each time they are washed, very annoying.

title: I expected more form fitting
text: I expected more form fitting. They are cute, but not what I expected!

title: Description misleading
text: The description was misleading as to the fabric and the return policy is multiple Steps.

title: It took several tries for the site to…
text: It took several tries for the site to allow me to add my credit card info. Almost gave up.

title: Long shipping time
text: Long shipping time, it was free but took over a week to receive my items. one pair of pants was not quality for the price. Felt cheap like shein

title: Sizes
text: I have a very hard time getting the sizing correct. My very first order - all the items were way to small so my second order I ordered up one size and now they are too big! Guess my body is not the right shape for Halara Clothing. Thank you,

title: Although I ordered petite pants
text: Although I ordered petite pants, they were still too long. When I tried to return, I was offered a gift card or I could pay the return shipping. I took the gift card. Hoping my next purchase is true to size.

title: Clothing is fine
text: Clothing is fine. Shipping took way too long. I wouldn't order again because of this.

title: They are very stretchy and tend to not…

title: Pants not black it's greyish
text: The color of the two pants is somehow like light grey not black.

title: I got sent the wrong product

title: No quality control
text: I have 4 pair of the same pants and they are all different (lengths, waist band, material, etc.)

title: Slow shipping
text: I like my purchases but it takes a really long time to receive them.

title: I love the yoga pants but the jeans I'm…
text: I love the yoga pants but the jeans I'm not satisfied with.

title: The order was wrong on 3 different…
text: The order was wrong on 3 different items Other than that is was okay

title: Not being able to exchange for a…
text: Not being able to exchange for a different size.   I love the clothes, but that is a problem because the pants are to big.

title: I absolutely love the dress, late delivery
text: I absolutely love the dress, but it took two weeks for me to get it, and my event already passed.

title: I wish the fabric was nicer
text: I wish the fabric was nicer. I live in a dry climate. It gets kind of static-y and sticks to my skin.

title: Took over a month to get them

title: Only ok

I have similar trousers/leggings from other brands that have solved this and also don’t have the weird seams. Overall these are wearable but I won’t buy another pair

title: Fragile lace!
text: They are nice looking but the lace is very fragile! Despite being extremely careful not to pull on the lace, the edges are too easy to snag or accidentally tug when putting them on. The fabric resembles spandex but isn't *too* noticeable when dressing them up (I got the black pair). I've had many lace detail leggings, and I believe the overall material may be more to blame than the actual lace (where the lace connects on the edges is the weakest spot/This may also be an off pair! Based on other reviews, others don't seem to have this issue, so I may have just received a pair that's a bit more flimsy where the lace connects). Overall, not an issue; it was a fair price for even a few uses! The top of the leggings is very flattering but also easily rolls. I’d recommend based on the overall look despite the expected short-term use of the pair I received)

title: Red Flags?
text: I'm surprised there aren’t more mixed or negative reviews for Halara, as I've encountered some unusual issues with their return process. The return policy seems quite unclear, and based on what I've found on Reddit, many customers have had to go through a lot of effort just to get a return address.Regarding the product quality, the material feels quite thin, and one pair of jeans I received had a strong chemical odor that I haven’t been able to remove, even after washing them twice.I reached out to return a few items that didn’t fit or flatter me. Initially, they offered me store credit if I kept the items, but I declined since I wasn’t interested in keeping them. In the end, they gave me a refund and told me I could keep the items, which was unexpected but appreciated.While it worked out in my case, the whole process felt odd, and it seems like many others have had similar experiences. Overall, I feel there are some transparency issues with the company that raise a few concerns. With ONLY positive reviews here it's very odd with everything else I've seen about them online.

text: Love the product, don't get me wrong. I'm usually really hesitant to use fast fashion sites, but I was assured I'd be happy. I am about the product but understand that pre sale item, means that everything gets held up until the pre sale date, regardless of the shipping time you picked. Even if just 1 item is presale, the whole order gets held up. Pre sale seems like a convoluted way of saying they want to wait on enough orders before fulfilling your order. If thats the case, then say that. Lots of "oh sorry you just misunderstood what you ordered" with a side of "oh well next time just tell us and we will split your shipments up". No. Ya'll told me 8-10 business days and I had to wait 20 business days. Halara needs to do better in being upfront about shipping times. Don't fine print gaslight me either.

title: Hit or Miss Quality - Detailed Item Review
text: I placed a big order after 2 previous positive experiences with this brand. I read a lot of reviews and inspected all the brand photos and reviewers’ photos of each item. One issue that I have found with this brand is that the items can be very hit or miss in terms of quality. Based on my experiences, I find it difficult to recommend the brand as a whole and choose instead to recommend specific items. This time around I ordered 5 items, many of which I had had my eye on for a while. Out of the 5 items I was happy with 2, satisfied with 2 (though needing alterations), and unhappy with 1. The HalaraMagic high waisted denim midi skirt I’d rate a 5/5! Super comfortable, great stretch, and very flattering. I know that long denim skirts have been trending lately, but they’re far outside of my personal style so I was hesitant to try this skirt. First try on, I wasn’t very impressed but once I figured out some outfits to use it in I was sold. I have found it surprisingly easy to style and can not stress enough that EVERY time I wear it out I get at least one compliment from a stranger. I have recommended this skirt too many times to count in the short time that I’ve had it. The Floor length Sweetheart Neckline long sleeve dress is very comfortable and flattering. The material is sturdy BUT seeing as it is heavy it does tend to pull down slightly making it a little harder to support with a small chest. The fabric does cling to the body so the proper undergarments are important. It has hidden pockets which is a nice addition for comfortability and practicality. I haven’t had the chance to wear this one out yet, but my boyfriend gave it a high rating. Classy and stylish dress. The Breezeful backless floor length activewear dress was one that I had liked for a while and based on the positive reviews I decided to purchase. Overall, the dress is pretty flattering but I have some issues with the top. The straps are not adjustable which means that for me, the top hangs just slightly too low making it look awkward and pushing out my armpits too much for my liking. The strap thickness changes mid way which I’m not a fan of as it adds to the awkward/cheap look. I am waiting to see if I will be able to shorten the straps to fix these issues before I can actually wear this. I know that there is a long sleeve version of this dress, I would probably recommend looking into that one instead as the spaghetti strap design on this one is poorly executed. The V Neck short sleeve jumpsuit was disappointing. The fabric is very thin, which may prove to be beneficial for extra air flow during hot months, but it looks very sheer on the hanger. I ordered it in black because I did notice in some review photos that the material did look a little sheer, I don’t notice too much of an issue when the jumpsuit is on (with black undergarments) but I don’t think I would risk purchasing this in a light colour just to be safe. My main issue is again with the top. I ordered this thinking it looked conservative and professional in the model photos. I sized down to a Small as it looked a little oversized, the top is MASSIVE, NOT SMALL CHEST FRIENDLY. The V neck, which looks like it goes down to about the breast bone in the photos, extends down to my navel. I wish there was some kind of button or clasp to keep the top pinned shut as I will have to sew one in myself or wear an additional shirt underneath this in order for it to be wearable in the workplace (or anywhere really). Overall, it is workable but not the most flattering to begin with and in need of alterations, so I would not recommend. Finally, the ruched backless, tie back split hem body con mini dress was incredibly disappointing. Admittedly, I made the assumption that this dress would be the same signature “athletic” fabric as every other item I’d ordered from this website based on how it looked in the photos, so that is on me. The item is more of a cotton/nylon type feel which means it lacks the structure that I typically like in Halara’s items. The top of the dress should be a straight/square neck based on the photos, but the one I received looks like a wrinkled cowl neck. The neckline sags no matter how tightly I tie the back, and the bow at the back seems to loosen gradually which makes the top worse. The ruching on the straps just makes them look as if they’ve been sewn in folds so they sit uncomfortably and slide off with any movement. I took photos to submit in the app review but the app would not let me add them. I have kept it in the bag and am looking into the return process to see if the cost to return it will be worth the hassle. I was most excited for this dress and was so upset to have paid so much and had high expectations for something that was unflattering and not the quality that I expected. The ordering process was easy. Payment secure. Wish items were named in a way that is easier to look up and reference.

title: I have been tempted to purchase from…
text: I have been tempted to purchase from you for about a year. I finally did and although I love the clothes I see on the models I won’t purchase again.1st- the dress I purchase in a medium (the  size I consistently have worn for 10 years) looked equivalent to a teenage size 2. The shirt  I purchased was too tight on the elastic waistband. Your adds are very catchy and tempting but it’s hard to get a true idea of the items when the models are moving around so quickly. Some still shots would be helpful.2nd- because the items  didn’t fit I felt I best to return. I appreciate the offer of keeping the items and being issued a gift card to use within 3 months but in my case I felt it best to lose my shipping money for a refund.The entire return policy is cumbersome, slow and the customer has to pay the shipping:So after a back and forth 3 day e-mail process, which included having to send photos. I was finally given the location of the return center  which was inside a Staples about 7 miles from where I live. I love to support small businesses but unless Halara’s return policy becomes easier I will not purchase from Halara again. I’ll just have to admire the moving models on Instgram.

title: Mixed experience
text: The clothing items that I did like, like the Backless Twist Flare Dress (one of their best sellers), and the High Waisted Tie Side Wide Leg work Pants were amazing and just as I was hoping that they would be. The rest of the items were a bag of mixed tricks. Some items are VERY cheaply made, such as the Funnel Neck Long Sleeve Slim Peplum Work Tee which lacked stitching in the collar and was cropped shorter than shown yet, I still liked how fitted it was with stitching to create a strong rib cage effect. It is like the effort is put where it is needed and then saved where it might not be needed. Also, the order was oddly delayed, and then Customer service had a slow response time that actually was slower than having the clothes arrive, which was a bit odd. Overall, I'd order from them again, but this will be a shop where I'll always anticipate needing to return some items while loving the rest. And, I'll anticipate needing to be patient for all of the order to arrive.

title: In sum, the clothes, themselves, are reasonable - in cost and quality. Your customer service and business practices leave a lot to be desired.
text: I liked most of the things I bought - only 2 out of 9 items I did like the fit/material. They felt like wearing a potato sack or circus tent. I feel that forcing the customer to pay for return shipping is poor business and customer service. If you truly stand behind your products, you would allow free returns/exchanges, especially since it is impossible to try these clothes on before buying them. I did end up buying a few more things after I received my order. One of the things in that order included a pre-order item. I almost cancelled the entire order when I realized that you do not ship the rest of the in stock items on their normal schedule. Instead, you wait for the pre-order item to come in and ship the whole order. That is absolutely disgusting to me. So, in sum, the clothes, themselves, are reasonable - in cost and quality. Your customer service and business practices leave a lot to be desired.

title: Returns policy may be a deal breaker for me for future purchases

title: Easy to navigate website and fast…

title: Not great
text: The experience was ok. I have short legs and found all the pants to long. I attempted to reach out to customer service and the wait was entirely to long, then they wanted the link to the pants to answer my question about inseam length for petite as I could not find it on the page. Then they took to long to return to chat to even answer the question and I had to end chat. I thought perhaps the CS rep was not an actual employee of Halara and just does not know the product. Maybe they outsource that part, Additionally, the same size in the jean pants differs in the jogger and a couple of the leggings. Finally, it sucks they don't do exchanges, only returns. That seems like a financial loss to me and poor business decision. I am not going to return then reorder. I wasn't that pleased to begin with. However, I would have exchanged and tried again. I ordered 7 items, love one of the jeans (have to have it hemmed) and returned the rest. If you are a new customer I would still encourage you to try them and see for yourself.

title: Takes way too long to get the order.

title: It makes me look fatter....That's my…
text: It makes me look fatter....That's my only complaint. I like the length, the feel, the wide legs, but my waist looks so much bigger because of the way the pleats jut out. I'll still wear them.. I'm glad you made a petite size. I wish you do that with all of your clothes. I got a petite medium.

title: I received two pairs of the same color…
text: I received two pairs of the same color of pants when I swear I tried ordering two different colors. I looked into doing an exchange and found out that there are no exchanges allowed. I would have to return and reorder which would end up costing me more money than it's worth. As for the products, I do like them a lot. My only complaint is that the little logo is on the back of the left calf on lots of the pants and it looks like a sticker and several people have stopped me and told me I have a sticker on my pants. My mom even bent down to try to take it off for me. So it's kind of just a pretty dumb place to put a little logo I guess.

title: The shipping time was very slow

title: I love the products
text: I love the products, the fit, etc. However I was super not impressed with whoever they used to ship the products. I live in a 4plex in a crime ridden city and it was just left in plain sight on my doorstep. Like anyone with half a brain would have put in in between the screen and main door, or in the mailbox. Luckily my neighbour took it inside as I was away for the weekend and it surely would not have been there by the time I returned.

title: I like the flowy leg on these pants

I'm 5'8" and 170 lb. Exchanging medium regular for regular tall.

title: Sagging, poor quality leggings, returns not covered
text: Edited after reply from company: they were very responsive and did agree to accept the return without the tag since the leggings were still in new condition. And I actually found the tag before shipping back anyways. Hopefully they work on product quality and return process. The leggings I ordered fit well at first so I took the tags off to wear them but after wearing for a couple of hours sagged in the crotch. I wanted to return but don’t have the tag so the return won’t be accepted. And you have to pay for return shipping even though the return is due to poor quality. I feel like the business should pay for returns for certain reasons. Poor quality should be one of those reasons. Now my option is a gift card but I’ve ordered 3 leggings total from this company and all 3 sag in the crotch so I don’t have any desire to use a gift card to order more and have the same result.

title: Comfy, watch out for detailing quality

title: First time shopping here

One was as expected although I thought it runs a little small and I thought I was ordering up a size to avoid this.  The other item didn't fit me at all like the advertising photos so wanted to return only to learn that you have to pay for return shipping and the they don't make the process very easy.  Therefore, I took the gift card option and will likely not use it so I'm stuck with a product I don't want.  Probably won't shop here again.

title: Good quality but long wait
text: I love the dresses. They are so beautiful and comfortable. They are also good quality. I enjoy these dresses so much that I turned to Halara to order my wedding dress. I still have some weight to lose in order for it to look amazing on me but it still looks good. The sizes are pretty accurate. My biggest problem is how long it takes to get to me. Shipping takes forever, sometimes 2-3 weeks. I understand that it's coming from a different country so there's customs and stuff but, wow. It's a long wait. I haven't had to return anything so I don't know if their customer service is any good.

title: Terrible return process

title: Nice skorts. Refund policy should be improved.
text: I love their skorts and easy to order from website. The negative thing I have to add is that I was sent a skirt which had a defect/mark on it and I wanted to get a refund so I can order a replacement. Customer service were relatively efficient to give me a refund, but they didn’t refund the shipping costs. Now it’s not my fault they sent me a faulty item, so why should I be penalised and not be refunded with the full amount. title: Block Collar Zipper Sleeveless 2-Piece Pocket Mini Gold Dress
text: I ordered the Block Collar Zipper Sleeveless 2-Piece Pocket Mini Gold Dress for a golf outing and was not able to wear it. The dress is SUPER short and the shorts are too. I tried wearing it the day before to make sure I was comfortable to be in front of others and the entire day was just me readjusting. The dress is also tight. Not too tight that it was uncomfortable, but too tight that you can see the outline of the shorts underneath which was not very flattering. I also did not like that the shorts were not high-rise nor compression shorts. It would have been better if the shorts came up higher above the waist line to avoid lines showing on the dress and for more comfortability. It would have been a lovely dress but it was not practical to actually play golf in.

title: a little disappointed
text: My first items came and even with the sizing chart and having read through the reviews all of the items seemed to run small. I was initially hoping for breathable, body sliming athletic wear but I felt all the clothing items I purchased were meant to be worn by a slim, slender body size and even ordering sizes XL didn't seem big enough for my slightly larger than average frame. The items I did get were of high quality but fell below my expectations of being slimming and complimentary, as had been advertised. I wrote an email to return the items and was offered store credit and told to donate the first order, which was very generous but then the pants I ordered on my second go-round aren't the same level of quality I had expected. They are wearable but look cheaply made and the belt buckle loops are already falling off, out of the packaging. The top I ordered in my second order is great, flowing and helps to hide the peri-menopausal pooch that I was hoping the other items would also help to camouflage. Overall, I can't say that I would recommend Halara for anyone who isn't a slim and thin  woman as I do not think the clothing items I purchased were flattering to an average woman's figure. Also, the shipping took far longer than almost all other online stores that are comparable.

title: I wanted to love their dresses
text: I wanted to love their dresses. I really did. I placed 3 orders and got more excited each time than the last. They were flattering, the perfect thickness and exactly what I wanted. But they have a huge problem--they are prohibitively stain-prone. Any light coloured dress cannot be kept remotely near to another fabric or anything with any colour in it, or the colour leaches into the fabric and becomes practically dyed in there. I have two beautiful dresses soaking with oxi clean right now and have no idea how in the long term I'm going to manage dresses which are so hard to upkeep. I am meticulous about washing like colours together. I have never had this problem before. I'm really disappointed as the cut, colour and everything about them otherwise is perfect. Advice to anyone thinking of ordering, only buy darker colours, unless you plan on tie dying them. Also, the new logo makes the items look cheap. They're poorly placed and make no sense. I've had people point it out as if I had something stuck on my shirt. It breaks my heart to say, I'm unlikely to repurchase.
